titleStmt.title: Hydrostaticks: or, Instructions concerning water-works. Collected out of the papers of Sir Samuel Morland Containing the method which he made use of in this curious art.
titleStmt.author: Morland, Samuel, Sir, 1625-1695.
Morland, Joseph, 1670-1716.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Lawrence, at the Angel in the Poultrey, over against the Compter,

notesStmt.note: With five final pages of advertisements.
Copy cataloged stained, affecting title page and text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Angel in the Poultrey, over against the Compter
